title: Devil's Night of the Bimbos
description: A Halloween story of mind control and bimbofication.Tara, Jessica and Michelle hate their new jobs at LoveCo. But at least they have each other and can avoid the other bimbos and himbos at the office. That is until their millionaire boss tells them they must attend the staff Halloween party. Little do they know what he intends to do to them once the costumes are on. (Contains FF sex, mind control and masturbation. For adults only)
author: Lucian Carter
